name: Links DNSRecords of type CNAME to the DNSRecords they point to

statements.query: MATCH (source:DNSRecord{type: "CNAME"}) WITH source MATCH (target:DNSRecord) WHERE source.value = target.name MERGE (source)-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]->(target) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = $UPDATE_TAG SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG
